name: System time
comment: Epoch seconds

name: EMS work mode
[Grid Sensor] Status
comment:
(gateway or meter connection status)
0: not connected
1: connected

name: [Grid sensor] Active power
comment:
Data collected from grid sensor at grid to system checkpoint;
>0 buy from grid;<0 sell to grid

name: [Grid sensor] reactive power
comment: Data collected from grid sensor at grid to system checkpoint;

name: On/Off Grid status
comment:
0: on grid
1: off grid (auto)
2: off grid (manual)

name: Max active power
comment: This is should be the base value of all active power adjustment actions

name: Max apparent power
comment: This is should be the base value of all reactive power adjustment actions

name: General Alarm1
comment: If any hybrid inverter has alarm , then this alarm will be set accordingly. Refer to Appendix 2

name: General Alarm2
comment: If any hybrid inverter has alarm , then this alarm will be set accordingly. Refer to Appendix 3

name: General Alarm3
comment: If any hybrid inverter has alarm , then this alarm will be set accordingly. Refer to Appendix 4

name: General Alarm4
comment: If any hybrid inverter has alarm , then this alarm will be set accordingly. Refer to Appendix 5

name: [ESS] power
comment:
<0: discharging
>0: charging

name: Available max active power
comment:
Feed to the ac terminal.
Count only the running inverters

name: Available min active power
comment:
Absorb from the ac terminal.
Count only the running inverters

name: Available max reactive power
comment:
Feed to the ac terminal.
Count only the running inverters

name: Available min reactive power
comment:
Absorb from the ac terminal.
Count only the running inverters

name: [ESS] Available max charging power
comment: Count only the running inverters

name: [ESS] Available max discharging power
comment: Count only the running inverters

name: Plant running state
comment: Refer to Appendix 1

name: [Grid sensor] Phase A active power
comment:
Data collected from grid sensor at grid to system checkpoint;
>0 buy from grid;<0 sell to grid

name: [Grid sensor] Phase B active power
comment:
Data collected from grid sensor at grid to system checkpoint;
>0 buy from grid;<0 sell to grid

name: [Grid sensor] Phase C active power
comment:
Data collected from grid sensor at grid to system checkpoint;
>0 buy from grid;<0 sell to grid

name: [Grid sensor] Phase A reactive power
comment: Data collected from grid sensor at grid to system checkpoint;

name: [Grid sensor] Phase B reactive power
comment: Data collected from grid sensor at grid to system checkpoint;

name: [Grid sensor] Phase C reactive power
comment: Data collected from grid sensor at grid to system checkpoint;

name: [ESS] Available max charging capacity
comment: Count only the running inverters

name: [ESS] Available max discharging capacity
comment: Count only the running inverters

name: General Alarm5
comment:
If any hybrid inverter has alarm , then this alarm will be set accordingly.
Refer to Appendix 11

name: [ESS] SOH
comment: This value is the weighted average of the SOH of all ESS devices in the power plant, with each rated capacity as the weight.

name: Start/Stop
comment:
0: Stop
1: Start

name: Active power fixed adjustment target value
Reactive power fixed adjustment target value
comment:
Range: [-60.00 * base value,60.00 * base value].
Takes effect globally regardless of the EMS operating mode.

name: Active power percentage adjustment target value
Q/S adjustment target value
comment:
Range: [-60.00,60.00].
Takes effect globally regardless of the EMS operating mode.

name: Power factor adjustment target value
comment:
Range: (-1,-0.8] ∪ [0.8,1].
Grid Sensor needed.
Takes effect globally regardless of the EMS operating mode.

name: Phase A active power fixed adjustment target value
comment: Valid only when output type is L1/L2/L3/N

name: Phase B active power fixed adjustment target value
comment: Valid only when output type is L1/L2/L3/N

name: Phase C active power fixed adjustment target value
comment: Valid only when output type is L1/L2/L3/N

name: Phase A reactive power fixed adjustment target value
comment: Valid only when output type is L1/L2/L3/N

name: Phase B reactive power fixed adjustment target value
comment: Valid only when output type is L1/L2/L3/N

name: Phase C reactive power fixed adjustment target value
comment: Valid only when output type is L1/L2/L3/N

name: Phase A active power percentage adjustment target value
comment:
Valid only when output type is L1/L2/L3/N.
Range: [-100.00,100.00]

name: Phase B active power percentage adjustment target value
comment:
Valid only when output type is L1/L2/L3/N.
Range: [-100.00,100.00]

name: Phase C active power percentage adjustment target value
comment:
Valid only when output type is L1/L2/L3/N.
Range: [-100.00,100.00]

name: Phase A Q/S fixed adjustment target value
comment:
Valid only when output type is L1/L2/L3/N.
Range: [-60.00,60.00]

name: Phase B Q/S fixed adjustment target value
comment:
Valid only when output type is L1/L2/L3/N.
Range: [-60.00,60.00]

name: Phase C Q/S fixed adjustment target value
comment:
Valid only when output type is L1/L2/L3/N.
Range: [-60.00,60.00]

name: Remote EMS enable
comment:
0: disabled
1: enabled
When needed to control EMS remotely, this register needs to be enabled.
When enabled, the plant's EMS work mode (30003) will switch to remote EMS.

name: Independent phase power control enable
comment:
Valid only when output type is L1/L2/L3/N.
To enable independent phase control, this parameter must be enabled.
0: disabled
1: enabled

name: Remote EMS control mode
comment: Mode values’ definition refer to Appendix 6

name: ESS max charging limit
comment:
[0, Rated ESS charging power].
Takes effect when Remote EMS control mode (40031) is 3 or 4.

name: ESS max discharging limit
comment:
[0, Rated ESS discharging power].
Takes effect when Remote EMS control mode (40031) is 5 or 6.

name: PV max power limit
comment: Takes effect when Remote EMS control mode (40031) is 3, 4, 5 or 6.

name: [Grid Point] Maximum export limitation
comment:
Grid Sensor needed.
Takes effect globally regardless of the EMS operating mode.

name: [Grid Point] Maximum import limitation
comment:
Grid Sensor needed.
Takes effect globally regardless of the EMS operating mode.

name: PCS maximum export limitation
comment: Range: [0, 0xFFFFFFFF]. With value 0xFFFFFFFF, register is not valid. In all other cases, Takes effect globally.

name: PCS maximum import limitation
comment: Range: [0, 0xFFFFFFFF]. With value 0xFFFFFFFF, register is not valid. In all other cases, Takes effect globally.

name: Running state
comment: Refer to Appendix 1

name: Max. reactive power adjustment value fed to the ac terminal
Max. reactive power adjustment value absorbed from the ac terminal
Alarm1
comment: Refer to Appendix 2

name: Alarm2
comment: Refer to Appendix 3

name: Alarm3
comment: Refer to Appendix 4

name: Alarm4
comment: Refer to Appendix 5

name: Alarm5
comment: Refer to Appendix 11

name: Grid frequency
comment: Hz

name: A-B line voltage
comment: Invalid when output type is L/N, L1/L2/L3/N, or L1/L2/N

name: Phase A voltage
comment: When output type is L/N, refers to “Phase voltage”

name: Phase B voltage
comment: Invalid when output type is L/N, L1/L2/L3/N, or L1/L2/N

name: Phase C voltage
comment: Invalid when output type is L/N, L1/L2/L3/N, or L1/L2/N

name: Phase A current
comment: When output type is L/N, refers to “Phase current”

name: Phase B current
comment: Invalid when output type is L/N, L1/L2/L3/N, or L1/L2/N

name: Phase C current
comment: Invalid when output type is L/N, L1/L2/L3/N, or L1/L2/N

name: PV1 voltage
comment: Please refer to the PV count listed in Table2-1 in chapter 2, to ensure if the register is available.

name: Startup time
comment: s

name: Shutdown time
comment: s

name: PV5 voltage
comment: Please refer to the PV count listed in Table2-1 in chapter 2, to ensure if the register is available.

name: PV15 current
comment: A

name: [DC Charger] Current charging capacity
comment: Single time

name: [DC Charger] Current charging duration
comment: Single time

name: [DC Charger] Start/Stop
comment:
0: Start
1: Stop

name: Remote EMS dispatch enable
comment:
0: disabled
1: enabled
The enabled inverter only reacts on power control command from register: 41501, 41503, 41505, 41506, 40507.

name: System state
comment:
System states according to IEC61851-1 definition.
Refer to Appendix 7.

name: Alarm1
comment: Refer to Appendix 8

name: Alarm2
comment: Refer to Appendix 9

name: Alarm3
comment: Refer to Appendix 10

name: Start/Stop
comment:
0: Start
1: Stop

name: Charger output current
comment:
[6, X]
X is the smaller value between the rated current and the AC-Charger input breaker rated current.
